nodes.text: This aged Human male controller served the Alliance to Restore the Republic at Echo Base on the planet Hoth in 3 ABY. He fought during the Battle of Hoth against the Galactic Empire from the base's command center, and was one of two final controllers still present at their posts, including Toryn Farr, when Princess Leia Organa issued the formal order for all Rebel forces on the battlefield to disengage and begin the final retreat from Hoth.
